channel.title: How do i make new shops and how do i
channel.description:
how do i make new shops i kno how to add items but not how to add shop and also how do i change the position of the shop like where it is.
if u post itd really help thx :D

item.title: How do i make new shops and how do i
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

search client for wanneshop, you will eventualy see a list of shops, add yours there, its easy to figure out how it works, tahts were it links shop and npc together.

Read full topic
